body.p: Because the risk adjustment for non-financial risk reflects the compensation the entity would require for bearing the non-financial risk arising from the uncertain amount and timing of the cash flows, the risk adjustment for non-financial risk also reflects:

li.p: the degree of diversification benefit the entity includes when determining the compensation it requires for bearing that risk; and
both favourable and unfavourable outcomes, in a way that reflects the entity’s degree of risk aversion.
